code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OrdersPage=()=>{const[orders,setOrders]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("http://localhost:5050/api/orders").then(res=>setOrders(res.data)).catch(err=>console.error("Error loading orders:",err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-100 p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-center text-indigo-700 mb-6",children:"\uD83D\uDCE6 Past Orders"}),orders.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center text-gray-500",children:"No orders found."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-6 max-w-4xl mx-auto",children:orders.map(order=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white shadow-md rounded-lg p-6 border border-gray-200",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-2 text-lg font-semibold text-gray-800",children:["Order #",order.orderid," \u2014 \uD83D\uDCB0 $",parseFloat(order.ordertotal).toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:["\uD83D\uDC64 Customer: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-medium",children:order.customername})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:["\uD83D\uDD52 Time: ",new Date(order.ordertimestamp).toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:["\uD83D\uDCB3 Payment: ",order.paymentmethod]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"mt-4 text-sm text-gray-700 list-disc list-inside",children:order.items.map((item,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["\uD83E\uDDFE Item ID: ",item.menu_item_id," | Qty: ",item.quantity," | $",parseFloat(item.price).toFixed(2)," \u2014 ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"italic",children:item.transactioncategory})]},idx))})]},order.orderid))})]});};export default OrdersPage;
